​ com.kirsanovalexander1996.procdepmonitor ​ MIT ​ MIT ​ Process Dependency Monitor ​ Retrieving information about loaded process dependencies ​ ​ ​
​ Cross-platform application for obtaining information about loaded process dependencies. May be useful for deployment and assembly or to verify integrity standalone folders. ​ ​ ​ ​ com.kirsanovalexander1996.procdepmonitor.desktop ​ ​ ​ ​ List of dependencies of one of the processes ​ https://github.com/3dproger/ProcessDependencyMonitor/raw/master/misc/screenshot-linux-1.png ​ ​ ​ ​ https://github.com/3dproger/ProcessDependencyMonitor https://github.com/3dproger/ProcessDependencyMonitor/issues mailto:collymaccy@gmail.com
